aboutLeft.name: Phuc Huynh
aboutLeft.designation: UI/UX Design, Product Design based in Viet Nam

aboutRight.aboutText: I'm a passionate UI/UX designer and front-end developer with a lifelong love for creating intuitive and visually appealing digital experiences.  Since 1994, I've honed my skills in both design and code, allowing me to bridge the gap between aesthetics and functionality.

archivement.text: Hi there! I'm Phuc Huynh, a UI/UX designer & developer with a proven track record of delivering visually appealing and highly functional websites and apps.
I'm dedicated to understanding user needs and translating them into intuitive, engaging interfaces. I'm proficient in  software development & ui/ux design.

experienceData.text: Passionate UI/UX Designer & Developer. Dedicated to Crafting Exceptional Digital Experiences.

serviceData.title: Luckytech
serviceData.heading: UI/UX Design, Product Design, Business Analytics
serviceData.description:
- Research & design UX, write document for team developments product of company & customers.
- Design UI/UX for apps blockchain, DApp & Game-Fi , ect...
- Support write document, guiline & BA document product for team development

serviceData.title: Time Universal
serviceData.heading: Web Designer
serviceData.description: Design web layout & UX Research for customer of company with many different fields : Real Estate, Education, Travel, Ecommerce, ect...

serviceData.title: Kyanon Digital
serviceData.heading: Software Engineer
serviceData.description: Development for mobile application project as required of company & custome with Android, iOS, React-native, Flutter...

paragraphList.text: NFT, blockchain, marketplace
MAMMA MIA SỐNG NÂNG TẦM GIÁ TRỊ - CHUẨN PHONG CÁCH QUỐC TẾ
Thiết bị vệ sinh, thiết bị phòng tắm, thiết bị nhà bếp
Game MOBA Landing Page Design
THE POWER OF THE MULTIVERSE, COOLGODS BASE ON MYTHOLOGY, OFFERS A BRAND NEW 3RD-PERSON MOBA ADVENTURE!
